transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha ji Matri export baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha ji Matri export se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: ha
Executive: ji Vaibhav bol raha hu mai India Mart Noida se
Customer: Kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Vaibhav bol raha hu mai India Mart Noida se account manager aapki company ka
Customer: ha ha
Executive: mam aapka ek ye tha complaint thi regarding the buyer misbehavior right?
Customer: ha
Executive: to aapka isme matlab kya aap solution expect kar rahe the mam India Mart se matlab what is the solution you are expecting from India Mart side kyuki matlab buyer ke against to India Mart boliye
Customer: Buyer ke against to kuch karta nahi hai obvious nahi hota hai
Executive: nahi aap agar aapko agar issue hai to jaise ki aap buyer agar aap chalti call pe aap chaho to aap hash one daba sakte hai buyer agar fraud aapko
Customer: pehle buyer ne aapko yaad ho to wo kuch order tha uske related unhone complaint ki thi
Executive: hmm hmm matlab wahi main aap message check karo maine aapko whatsapp pe sab message kiya hai uske related
Customer: yes yes yes yes yes
Executive: to aapka matlab aapne wo aapka wo issue resolve ho gaya aapne matlab aapne product redeliver kar diya hai?
Customer: maine redeliver abhi tak kiya nahi hai product ready hai
Executive: alright
Customer: to maine videos bhej diye hai ki dekho aapka repair ho gaya hai
Executive: ji ji ji so unke baad ka record ha
Customer: nahi wo aisa bol rahe hai ki nahi main video se vishwas nahi karungi mere pass aayega na tabhi bolungi ki sahi hai ya nahi hai abhi unko beech mein beech mein courier mein kuch hua to wo to mujh pe dal denge ki aapne damage bheja hai to aap pehle check kar lo agar aapko check se confirmation aayega unse baat kar lo main direct baat nahi karungi wo mujhse bahut rudely baat karti hai
Executive: aapka complaint to legal wala to band ho chuka hai yaha pe matlab jo ek wo tha
Customer: dekho aapko customer se jo bhi baat karni hai wo kar lo
Executive: customer se we cannot connect with the buyer India Mart matlab isme wo nahi hai agar matlab buyer se connect karne ko mere ko allow kare allowed hi nahi hai mere ko first of all India Mart se
Customer: nahi kar sakte main unse direct baat karti hu to mere se wo bahut rudely baat karte hai abhi unko wo repairing wali want chahiye to unko mujhe confirm karna padega ki ha thik hai bhej do ye sahi hai fir courier mein agar kuch hota hai to wo alag baat hai lekin wo India Mart se aur customer se confirmation aayega ki thik hai sahi hai bhej do tabhi main bhejungi warna
Executive: India Mart ka isme confirmation nahi aayega aap ek cheez aap kar sakte hai kyuki aapke matlab jo pritesh sir se bhi meri baat hui thi aap log ye kehte ho ki yaar unboxing ka recording video hona chahiye right to ab wo wo clearly video bhejte nahi hai last time bhi unhone clearly nahi bheja tha
Executive: mam isme dekhiye India Mart ka to isme jyada involvement hai nahi buyer supplier India Mart is a matchmaking portal buyer supplier ke beech kya matlab dealing hoti hai that is totally up to the seller
Customer: wo mere se bahut rudely baat kar rahe hai na usme main kya karu
Executive: abhi main nahi respect karne wali thik hai abhi unko chahiye hoga to unko bolna padega ki ha ye sahi hai fir baad mein kuch issue hota hai wo alag cheez hai lekin main nahi bhejungi wo mere se bahut rudely baat karte hai abhi unko solution chahiye to wo aapko call kar sakte hai
Executive: agar unke matlab issue aata hai to wo to India Mart team handle karegi agar buyer ke end se complaint aati hai to
Executive: to mean mam dekhiye aapko bhi thoda sa ha matlab aapke end pe to matlab yahi main expect suggestion karunga mam dekhiye har client ko matlab khatam karna padta hai from the buyer side right matlab every deal matlab sab deal acche se ho aisa to possible nahi hota businessman mein aap mere se better business jante hai to but thik hai dekhiye goodwill market mein honi chahiye right thik hai ek aadha buyer ke upar niche ho sakta hai
Customer: ye sab mujhe mat batao ye sab mujhe mat batao wo to sab pata hai
Executive: aapko pata hi hai ye sab cheeze right aapko pata hi hai to thoda sa aapko matlab hmm
Customer: customer ko bhi normal behave karna chahiye kyuki wo kar nahi rahi hai wo bhi personal comment sab pass kar rahi hai to main unse direct baat nahi karne wali unko bhi chahiye to India Mart ke through baat kare
Executive: mam India Mart ka isme involvement nahi ho sakta agar buyer complaint karte hai
Customer: wo meri problem wo meri problem nahi hai aapne agar legal team ko involve kiya tha last time to from the buyer request alawa koi baat nahi hogi na to wo agar wo main maine to inform kar diya jisko karna tha aage wo jane aur aap jano kyuki abhi main usme direct kuch nahi karne wali
Executive: but but from India Mart side mam hum buyer se connect nahi kar sakte that is not allowed
Customer: wo customer ki problem hai usko agar chahiye to confirm karna padega kyuki ab main ye behavior tolerate nahi karungi
Executive: agar aapko issue hota hai to matlab aap usko block kar sakte ho agar aapko wo incoming call karte hai India Mart se us pe to aap usme hash one daba dijiyega repairing ki jo baat hai na main uski baat kar rahi hu agar unko chahiye to video mujhe bolna padega ha ye thik hai aap bhej do fir main bhejungi warna main nahi bhejungi kyuki mujhe tension isko lena nahi hai
Executive: mam pritesh sir ne mujhe bataya tha ki aap unboxing ki videos banate hai aap unko bol dijiyega ki unboxing ke video aapke hisab se koi bhi video clear banegi mam aap boliye ki document format mein bhej de clear dikh jayegi usme kya issue hai matlab aap keh dijiye ki document format mein share kar de aisa to hai nahi
Customer: unboxing video bhejte nahi hai clearly fir kuch pata nahi chalta hai
Executive: koi issue nahi hai mam aap matlab aap ek baar ye discuss kar sakte hai matlab aapko buyer supplier ke beech mein aapko ek understanding banana padega
Customer: problem nahi hai bhale hold pe rahe jo bhi issue hai wo to customer ko hoga to wo India Mart se baat karega main direct kuch baat nahi karne wali wo for sure hai
Executive: thik hai isme India Mart koi involvement nahi rakhegi that is for sure
Customer: mujhe koi problem nahi hai aapko karna karna hai wo aapki responsibility hai wo aapke upar hai mujhe to kuch nahi hai dekho customer ko jo karna hoga wo karega mujhe to koi problem nahi hai rahi baat kuch issue ki to meri bhi legal team hai fir wo handle kar legi wo India Mart pe case karna ho customer pe karna ho jo bhi karna ho wo wo kar denge ha
Executive: no issue with that aap thik hai matlab India Mart pe aap isme to matlab hum buyer se baat nahi kar sakte it is not allowed by India Mart ki hum buyer se baat kare to aapko jo karna tha wo kar diya baki aapke upar hai
Executive: yaha pe clients ko matlab inform karna jaruri hota hai mam ki matlab multiple complaint buyer ke unresolved nahi ho sakte portal pe matlab India Mart se ye bol out bhi nahi hai koi deal bhi nahi aap kar sakte India Mart pe kabhi bhi matlab agar aap matlab yes conflict tickets chalti rehti hai India Mart pe to wo fir aapko matlab mam thoda sa issue ho sakta hai aap please apne end pe bas thoda sa koshish kariye handle karke issue close karne ka hai na isko extend karne ka koi fayda nahi hai
Customer: tayar nahi hai aapko please baat kiya hai customer understand karne ko tayar nahi hai that's not my issue aapko jo karna hai karo thik hai main call rakh rahi hu I am I am not
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received rudely behavior from buyer.

- Buyer is not ready to trust the video.

- Wants confirmation from IndiaMART before shipping.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART's limited involvement.

- Suggested unboxing video with clear documentation.

- Executive said IndiaMART team will handle issue.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyer, rudely behavior, unboxing video, legal team
